Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    com.peterphi.std.guice.apploader.impl.GuiceInjectorBootstrap
    use GuiceBuilder directly instead. This class will be removed in a future release.
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraint
    use WebQuery instead
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraintBuilder
    use WebQuery and the associated builder methods, particularly WebQuery.decode(UriInfo)
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraintBuilderFactory
    use WebQuery and the associated builder methods, particularly WebQuery.decode(UriInfo)
    com.peterphi.std.guice.web.rest.setup.AbstractRESTGuiceSetup
    no longer required, extend GuiceSetup directly instead. This class will be removed in a future release.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.peterphi.std.guice.common.serviceprops.typed.TypedConfigRef.convert(Class<?>, String)
    use StringToTypeConverter directly instead
    com.peterphi.std.guice.database.dao.Dao.getByIds(Collection<ID>)
    use Dao.getListById(Collection) instead
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.dao.HibernateDao.createCriteria()
    use JPA2 Criteria with HibernateDao.createCriteriaQuery(), Hibernate has deprecated their old criteria query and it will produce runtime warnings
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.dao.HibernateDao.getByIds(Collection<ID>)
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.dao.HibernateDao.idProperty()
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ConstrainedResultSet.getConstraint()
    use WebQueryDefinition instead
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraintBuilder.build()
    use ResultSetConstraintBuilder.buildQuery() instead
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraintBuilderFactory.build(Map<String, List<String>>)
    use ResultSetConstraintBuilderFactory.builder(Map) and then call ResultSetConstraintBuilder.buildQuery()
    com.peterphi.std.guice.restclient.JAXRSProxyClientFactory.createClientWithPasswordAuth(Class<T>, URI, String, String)
    com.peterphi.std.guice.restclient.resteasy.impl.ResteasyProxyClientFactoryImpl.createClientWithPasswordAuth(Class<T>, URI, String, String)
    com.peterphi.std.guice.testing.GuiceUnit.validateInstanceMethods(List<Throwable>)
    deprecated in BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and going away in a future version
    com.peterphi.std.guice.testing.GuiceUnit.withAfters(FrameworkMethod, Object, Statement)
    deprecated in BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and going away in a future version. Should be changed to use Rules.
    com.peterphi.std.guice.testing.GuiceUnit.withBefores(FrameworkMethod, Object, Statement)
    deprecated in BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and going away in a future version. Should be changed to use Rules.
    com.peterphi.std.io.FileHelper.safeMove(File, File)
    use commons file utils FileUtils.moveDirectoryToDirectory instead
    com.peterphi.std.threading.ParamInvokeable.prepare(T)
    if calling a ParamInvokeable directly the call(T) method should be used; this method is for maintaining full backwards compatibility with ParamRunnable
    com.peterphi.std.types.SampleCount.parseVidispine(String)
    com.peterphi.std.types.SampleCount.toVidispineString()
    com.peterphi.std.types.StorageSize.getAmount()
    com.peterphi.std.types.Timebase.getInstance(String)
    use Timebase.valueOf(String) instead
    com.peterphi.std.types.Timecode.getInstance(long, boolean, Timebase, boolean)
    use method without supportDays
    com.peterphi.std.types.Timecode.getInstance(SampleCount, boolean, boolean)
    use method without supportDays (supportDays is now implicitly true) or dropFrame (drop frame timecode is not correctly supported currently)
    com.peterphi.std.types.Timecode.getSmpteTimecode(String, Timebase)
    com.peterphi.std.types.Timecode.toVidispineString()
    use getSampleCount().toEncodedString();
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraint(Map<String, List<String>>)
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraint(Map<String, List<String>>, int)
    use ResultSetConstraintBuilder instead
    com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.webquery.ResultSetConstraint(Map<String, List<String>>, List<String>, int)
    use ResultSetConstraintBuilder instead
    com.peterphi.std.io.filter.FilenameExtensionFilter(Iterable<String>, boolean)
    use boolean caseSensitive,Iterable extensions constructor instead
    com.peterphi.std.io.filter.FilenameExtensionFilter(String, boolean)
    use boolean caseSensitive,String... extensions constructor instead
